original_title: Charles Mingus Quintet - Live in Berlin 1972
overview: Joe Gardner, trumpet; Hamiet Bluiett, baritone sax & clarinet; John Foster, piano; Charles Mingus, bass; Roy Brooks, drums. Cat Anderson, trumpet, guest star on "Perdido". Philarmonie, Berlie, Germany, November 5, 1972.
title: Charles Mingus Quintet - Live in Berlin 1972
